text: Hello, I'm looking at RLZoo.jl's PPO implementation and I don't understand what is expected in the keyword action_log_prob of the PPOTrajectory struct when I call its constructor. Has anyone here used it ? Also, I see that the actor of a continuous PPOPolicy approximator should be a 'GaussianNetwork' according to the docstring. Is such a network implemented somewhere or does it mean we define one ourselves ?

elements.text: Hello, I'm looking at RLZoo.jl's PPO implementation and I don't understand what is expected in the keyword action_log_prob of the PPOTrajectory struct when I call its constructor. Has anyone here used it ? Also, I see that the actor of a continuous PPOPolicy approximator should be a 'GaussianNetwork' according to the docstring. Is such a network implemented somewhere or does it mean we define one ourselves ?

text: It is used to store the precalculated logprob in the last batch. The default constructor will initialize it correctly.

elements.text: It is used to store the precalculated logprob in the last batch. The default constructor will initialize it correctly.
